docs.text: What is Stockfish? Stockfish is a very powerful chess engine that is open source. As of writing, Stockfish 13 is the most current version. Read more about it! stockfishchess.org A guide on how to install Arena Chess GUI with the Stockfish engine. Download the latest Arena Chess archive from here Download the latest Stockfish archive from here Extract both .zip files to places that you will remember Open Arena Chess and navigate to Engines > Install New Engine Navigate to (your filepath)\stockfish-13-win\stockfish-13-win\Windows and install stockfish_(numbers)_x64.exe You have now installed Stockfish 11 with Arena Chess GUI! Just don't go cheating, alright?
docs.title: Arenachess with Stockfish

docs.text: A tutorial on how to use Checkpoint's cheat function. Hey! This guide is hosted at eiphax now This guide will walk you through how to use Checkpoint's cheat function. Sharkhive no longer works as it's primary feature has been merged into Checkpoint. This guide will allow us to use cheats using the Rosalina Menu. Required: Luma 9.1 or above. Checkpoint version 3.7.0 or above. If you do not have checkpoint or need to update it, you can download the latest .cia here . Obtaining Cheats Open Checkpoint. The icon is the black flag on your homescreen. Select the game you want to cheat on Press "Cheats" under Backup and Restore When you see the list of cheats, press Y to save all of them, then press B When prompted to store the cheat save file, press A You have aquired some cheats, now let's use them in game! Using them in game Open the Rosalina Menu by pressing L + down on the dpad + select Hover under the "Cheats..." menu and press A Select the cheats you want Press B until you're back in the game The cheats should be active. You're done! Troubleshooting Q: Checkpoint says "No available cheat codes for this title!" A: You'll need to add them manually. Consider this guide. Q: My cheats don't work/crash! A: Consider not using them. Q: My game isn't showing up! A: Make sure you have a save for the game. If you're sure you do hold B for a few seconds and the game should appear. Q: How do I cheat on DS Games? A: If you're have a cartridge of the game, consider Nitrohax . If you're using TwilightMenu++, download Cheats using the updater, then set TwilightMenu's skin to Acekard or R4. Go to the game you want to cheat on and press Y then press X. Enable the cheats you want and press X to save. Don't have TwilightMenu++? Consider this.
docs.title: Checkpoint Cheats
A tutorial on how to use Checkpoint's cheat function.

docs.text: Jindosh Riddle solver for Dishonored 2 Instructions for usage: using the image posted, input the people and heirlooms in the order that they appear in YOUR game. Then the script will input the person's name + the heirloom they own. Originally going to be a JS project (hence the reason this page exists) but I figured it would be easier to make a short python script. Now this page is used for usage of the script! How far we come. Now time to make a version that requires no user input. Wouldn't that be nice? Link to repo
docs.title: Jindosh Riddle Solver

docs.text: Recording 3DS Gameplay with Citra and OBS Citra is a 3DS emulator that has seen very good development in recent years. Many games are playable, and many games run flawlessly, you can have your 3DS games look better than they do on actual hardware. OBS is a very versatile piece of software that will allow you to record/stream Citra (and other stuff). Prerequisites Note that this is more of an advanced guide for users who are tech savvy and want the best quality possible while recording their 3DS gameplay. If you don't want to go through all the following steps or quality doesn't matter to you, check out Snickerstream Citra OBS A 3DS with Custom Firmware A computer capable of emulating and recording. Getting Started Install OBS and Citra If your game hasn't been dumped yet, follow the dump guide Once your game is dumped, transfer it to your computer via SD or FTP. The dumped game will be located in /gm9/out on your SD. Open Citra. If you have a .3DS file press File > Load File then select your .3DS file. If you have a .CIA, press File > Install CIA then select your .CIA file. Open your game that you want to record. Keep Citra open for the next steps. Recording Open OBS Down where it says Sources , press + to add a new source. Press Game Capture , and name the source whatever you want, then press OK. You should get brought to a screen that says Properties for your source. Press the box next to Mode and select Capture specific window . Next to where it says window, choose `[Citra-qt.exe]: Citra (version) | game). You should see your Citra window in OBS. You can resize the window by dragging it. Once its set to your liking, press Start Recording in OBS. You are done! Extras To view your recording, in OBS press File > Show Recordings . To transfer your 3DS save to Citra, check out this guide
docs.title: OBS and Citra

You should get brought to a screen that says Properties for your source. Press the box next to Mode and select Capture specific window . Next to where it says window, choose `[Citra-qt.exe]: Citra (version) | game). You should see your Citra window in OBS. You can resize the window by dragging it. Once its set to your liking, press Start Recording in OBS. You are done!

docs.text: Persona 5 Scramble Shenanigans Persona 5 Strikers is a Persona 5 spinoff that has been released worldwide in February of 2021. This page is a bit outdated but thats because I haven't been playing P5S. Enjoy whatever is here though. Getting the game (Switch) Go to https://accounts.nintendo.com and make a new account, MAKE SURE YOUR LOCATION IS SET TO JAPAN Once that is done, go make a new profile on your Switch Link the account you just made to that profile Login to the eshop with that profile Success! You can now access Japanese eshop, now just find Persona 5 Scramble and either install the demo or buy the game.
docs.title: Persona 5 Scramble Shenanigans

docs.text: Persona Q2 Stuff and findings Being the most recent 3DS release, stuff on Persona Q2 is hard to come across. Not even 3dsdb has its titleid, checkpoint has no cheats, half the patches made for the game crash. If you came here expecting some formal writeup, you're gonna be dissapointed, i'm just going to be dumping findings about the game and cheats and stuff. Values and whatever. Stuff 00040000001D7100 Is the TitleID for the US version of the game 00040000001D7600 Is the TitleID for the EU version of the game Godmode and Item cheats hopefully coming soon Cheats & Values This cheat is to give 20000 Yen, more if you change the value of course. 005F7144 being Yen. [Give 20000 Yen] DD000000 00000200 D3000000 00000000 005F7144 00006B0B D2000000 00000000
docs.title: Persona Q2 Shenanigans
